Container.Name: VaultHunters3rdEdition
Container.Overview: Vault Hunters - 1.18.2-alpha-0.0.1.zip Modded Minecraft Server[br][br][b]Vault Hunters - 1.18.2-alpha-0.0.1.zip[/b][br]Action RPG in Minecraft! Level up, learn talents and abilities, build a base, build farms collect the 25 artifacts and defeat the final boss![br]Version tags available:[br][br][br]Setup:[br][li]You must accept the EULA by setting the [b]EULA[/b] variable to [span style='color: #00E800;']true[/span] or the install will fail.[br]Optional:[br][li]You can setup a comma separated list of players who will have admin privileges in game by setting [b]OPS[/b]

Config.Name: Installed Location
Config.Description: Path to store the installed server files.

Config.Name: EULA
Config.Description: By typing TRUE you are indicating your agreement to the EULA of Mojang. Read it at https://account.mojang.com/documents/minecraft_eula before accepting it.

Config.Name: Port
Config.Description: Port for the server. Ignored if using a dedicated IP for the container.

Config.Name: OPS
Config.Description: Comma separated list of players to have op capability
